title: Three die in head-on collision accident in Manampitiya
body_lines: Three persons including a couple were killed when a bus collided head on with a three-wheeler in Manampitiya on the Polonnaruwa-Batticaloa main road this morning, Police said.
They said a 70-year old three wheel driver, his 62-year-old wife and another 72-year old woman died in the accident.
The bus was traveling from Polonnaruwa to the Batticaloa Teaching Hospital with a staff member, police said.
Preliminary investigations have revealed that the three-wheeler had collided head on with the bus while overtaking another bus.
The driver of the bus involved in the accident has been arrested.
